title: The Appeal Of Vintage-Style Electric Cars Is About To Be Tested In California
description:
MOKE electric cars are coming to the US, starting in California where the company aims to fill the demand for fun, open-air EVs with a vintage flair.

The post The Appeal Of Vintage-Style Electric Cars Is About To Be Tested In California appeared first on CleanTechnica.
